item.title: Drainage gullies full of detritus, 10th October
item.description:
Drainage gullies on Little Herberts Road from the entrance to Timbercombe Farm towards Timbercombe Lane are full of detritus and have not been cleared for many years. However, a program of work has just been undertaken on Timbercombe Lane; in effect the same road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Little Herberts Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Pothole in road, Elderly father fell in the road and required a visit to A&E, 10th October
item.description:
Tobyfield Road Bishops Cleeve, my Father was crossing from Bishops Close to go to the shops (co-op/ butcher/ norths bakery ) he fell in the road cutting open his hands and knees, a driver stopped and helped him up. There are two potholes next to each other, many people cross the road here to go to the shops.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tobyfield Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Manhole cover sinking, 10th October
item.description:
Manhole cover on junction of church road and shurdington road has sunk an inch or two over recent weeks. Sufficient that I now actively avoid driving over it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shurdington Road, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No timetables on new Bus Stops., 10th October
item.description:
New bus stops to left of Sunnyfield Lane on main road are much better and in a much safer location than old one's to right of Roundabout at Cold Pool Lane. Old stops in unsafe location have been removed but some 97 and 98 Stagecoach buses still stopping at old location. New stop has had timetable boards put up for one month now but still no timetables on them, leading to confusion for passengers and bus Driver's alike. Contacted Stagecoach Customer services yesterday, who's call centre is in Scotland, and they do not have access to mapping system's to pinpoint location, despite Postcode and name of location being given, as not a timing point and, therefore, not on Driver Duty boards. They state it is County Council responsibility to place timetables. Please get this sorted if you wish public to make use of, much better, service's, particularly for many elderly residents of Sunnyfield Lane.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cold Pool Lane, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes and degradation of road surface along entirety of Park Lane. Shoddy patching work earlier this year a compete waste of taxpayer money! Repairs urgently needed, 10th October
item.description:
Entirety of Park Lane affected. Proper patching required.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Lane, Sevenhampton, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned traffic lights and signs., 10th October
item.description:
Lobleys Drive Abbeymead No reason whatsoever for temp traffic lights to be in situ. No work going on, road is not dug up nor is the pavement, just temp lights and abandoned orange barriers on the highway. No one whatsoever on site doing any sort of work Please ask the contractor to collect their stuff by close of play today.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lobleys Drive, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.description:

item.title: Ringway barriers on the pavement, 10th October
item.description:
It appears that a section of the pavement in Wellington Square has been resurfaced (which is much appreciated) but the barriers have been left by Ringway for several weeks. I know there are tree roots which are causing the surface to be raised, so if there is additional work to be done here that is good - but if not please get the barriers removed as they are blocking the pavement.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wellington Square, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: The signpost is loose in the pavement & leaning. It could fall on a passing pedestrian., 10th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parabola Lane, Montpellier, Cheltenham
